pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gaussian Process Panel Modeling // Provides an implementation of Gaussian process panel modeling (GPPM). GPPM is described in Karch (2016; DOI:10.18452/17641) and Karch, Brandmaier Voelkle (2018; DOI:10.17605/OSF.IO/KVW5Y). Essentially, GPPM is Gaussian process based modeling of longitudinal panel data. 'gppm' also supports regular Gaussian process regression (with a focus on flexible model specification), and multi-task learning.
